name: Google Play
desc: The Google Play Android Developer API lets Android application developers manage some aspects of their Google Play developer accounts and perform some actions on data managed by Google Play.

values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/androidp: Access to the Google Play Android Developer
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/games: Scope for accessing data from Google Play Games.
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/appstate: Scope for using the App State service.
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/plus.log: scope for accessing the user's name, basic profile info, list of people in the user's circles, and writing app activities to Google.
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/plus.me: scope for accessing the user's Google+ profile data.
